svcproc.title: Variable Geometry Turbocharger (VGT) Assembly and Related Parts Cleaning

warning.para: To prevent personal injury or death, wear safety glasses with side shields. Limit compressed air pressure to 207 kPa (30 psi).

note.para: Do not use a caustic solution on turbocharger assembly and related components.

step1.para: Clean piping between turbocharger assembly and air cleaner assembly with soap and water. Dry all piping with filtered compressed air.
Clean air inlet piping and connecting hoses with filtered compressed air.
Clean oil inlet tube and oil drain tube with suitable solvent and a nylon brush. Dry tubes with filtered compressed air. Replace any damaged tubes.
